root.name: Itsuka Todoku, Ano Sora Ni
root.description: StoryThe people that live in the town of Koumeishi have never seen the stars in the night sky. Before night falls, and for centuries, clouds completely cover the sky. Every hundred years, 12 high school girls, each representing a sign of the western Zodiac, try to break the spell that befalls the town.You are Saku Tatsumi, member of a family which has produced great painters, novelists, etc, for a long time. You're the only exception. Unable to find your calling in life, you volunteer to go to Koumeishi for a reunion with a branch of the family, and find yourself in the middle of the mystery surrounding the town...Patches You can download a patch from the Official Site's support page. It adds new graphics to some of the existing events, and fixes some bugs. Note that the patch will render your existing saves useless.
